tooltip: Select Seres as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Seres focuses on establishing Churches in the early game to improve your Rupee economy and healing output.
Allows you to summon Seres, a hero that can heal wounded soldiers.
Goddess Churches available in Village Phase and boost territory generation by an additional 15%.
Deacons promote to Priestesses for free when reaching the Town Phase.
Seres can upgrade Churches to generate Rupees.
